article_title: Canadian Pacific Railway Gets Strike Notice From Engineers, Conductors
article_text:
Canadian Pacific Railway Ltd. said the union representing more than 3,000 of its locomotive engineers and conductors has served a strike notice for this weekend.

The Calgary-based company said a work stoppage could occur as early as 12:01 a.m. ET Sunday. It said its offer includes unspecified wage increases and a new model that “will improve the scheduling of regular time off and quality of life while enhancing our service and...
